title: 係iherb買左樽雜香料唔好食，另外搵左Ｄ，有冇好介紹？

replies.msg:
買左Simply Organic, Original Seasoning, Salt-Free

Ingredients:
Organic onion, organic garlic, organic carrot, organic black pepper, organic orange peel, organic natural lemon flavor (organic maltodextrin, organic gum acacia, organic lemon oil, natural flavor), organic paprika, organic tomato, organic mustard, organic coriander, organic thyme, organic parsley, organic celery seed, citric acid, organic cayenne.
唔好食

另外搵左
A. Organic Spice Right Everyday Blends, All-Purpose Salt-Free

Ingredients:
Organic onion, organic garlic, organic black pepper, organic tomato, organic bell pepper, organic carrot, organic orange peel, organic celery, organic sage, organic rice concentrate, organic cumin, organic thyme, organic oregano, organic rosemary.

B. Grilling Seasons, Steak, Organic

Ingredients
Organic garlic, organic onion, organic black pepper, sea salt, organic mustard seed, organic dill seed, organic paprika, organic chili pepper, organic coriander, organic sunflower oil.

C.Italian Seasoning

Ingredients:
Organic oregano, organic marjoram, organic thyme, organic basil, organic rosemary, organic sage.

D. Herbes De Provence

Organic thyme, organic rosemary, organic basil, organic parsley, organic oregano, organic tarragon, organic marjoram, organic lavender flowers.

E. Grilling Seasons, Chicken

Organic garlic, sea salt, organic sage, organic onion, organic rosemary, organic thyme, organic oregano, organic marjoram, organic black pepper, organic fennel seed, organic coriander, organic peppermint leaf, organic bay leaf.

F. Grilling Seasons, Vegetable

Organic onion, organic garlic, organic bell pepper, sea salt, organic black pepper, organic cumin, organic coriander, organic oregano, organic cilantro.

Q1我淨係加樽野(+鹽)，好唔好食？
Q2同埋有冇邊款係spicy? 我食唔到

Q4買過樽mixed herbs包含thyme,marjoram,parsley,oregano,sage,basil唔好食, 我會唔會覺得Italian Seasoning唔好食?

replies.msg: 香料真係隨心，可以跟食譜用茶匙就住份量，一路煮一路試味最緊要。

跟住佢個成份逐樣材料買黎試味
自己再將幾樣好食既拎去調味用仲好啦

落香水料就salt free多鳩餘啦
鹽是不可取代

replies.msg:
係，除左燒嘢食，雜香料好少用

介紹幾款常用

Bay leaf 炆嘢煮湯常用
Rosemary 好百搭，肉類海鮮都會用到，配羊肉一流
Oregano 燒肉焗肉用得比較多，pizza都成日用
Basil 建議買新鮮，即係我地既九層塔，唔洗多介紹

常用仲有Thyme Dill Sage等，但我建議用熟左上邊嗰幾款，理解左個味道之後再試其他
